doc.title: The 1st Team: History of the 1st Cavalry Division 1921-2006
doc.plot: History of the First Cavalry Division. The First Cavalry Division is the largest Army division in the United States. Veterans share their combat experiences from World War II to the current war in Iraq. This movie takes you through the division's campaigns which include the Pacific Islands, Korea, Vietnam, Bosnia and Iraq. Over 30 interviews combined with actual combat footage.
